subject: Specifications of Saplings for Avenue and Median plantations - reg.
text: HRai 76ly TTHRf giferasrot (Te35 9Rdev e TTHNf TFT4, HRG TTTFR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) {a 7a 0fl-5 Qdi 6, #azr-10, ERa5, 75f Rorlt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 T/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI Policy Guidelines/ Environment/ 2024 Policy Circular No.7.4.16/2024 dated 19th December, 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. EGHDIV-12030/38/2024-ENV & GHD Division (Comp. No. 267282)} Sub: Specifications of Saplings for Avenue and Median plantations reg: 644th Executive Committee Meeting held on 13.12.2024 took cognizance of Importance of Quality of Planting Material in raising a successful Avenue and Median Plantations the National Highways. Accordingly, the Committee has approved following specifications for saplings to be planted in avenue and Median Plantations: A. Specifications of Saplings for Avenue Plantations. 1 . Height Minimum 2 m 2 . Collar Girth 6 cm (that means collar thickness 2 cm) 3. Polybag Size 23 cm x 30 cm 4. Potting Mixture 1:2.4 (Sand: FYM: Soil Mix) 5. Half of the length of the seedling should have branches and leaves 6. The seedlings should be minimum 1.5 years old. Such seedlings would be having adequate root system to establish as a tree in future. B. Specification for Saplings for Median Plantations. 1 _ Height Around 60 cm 2. Collar Girth 4 cm 3. Polybag Size 15 cm x 25 cm 4. Potting Mixture 1.2.4 (Sand FYM: Soil Mix) 5. Half of the length of the seedling should have branches and leaves 2_ All Officers of NHAI are requested to ensure above specifications of Planting Material in all upcoming Plantation Projects including the ongoing Projects. 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
